events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but unfortunately it does not fit me well. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the product fit.
Assigning the refund case to our customer service representative to handle the request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 789456123, and I haven’t returned the jacket yet. Please send me the return instructions.
We have sent you an email with the prepaid shipping label and return instructions. Once we receive the jacket back, we will process a full refund immediately.
Thanks for the prompt help and detailed instructions. I appreciate the smooth process and will ship the jacket back today.
We have confirmed the receipt of the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us and we hope to serve you better in the future.
